name: Space Shooter Dog Fight Demo
description:
A demo made with Tabageos showing how to make a simple space ship shooter with a.i. enemy ships.

Use wasd or arrows to move the ship, use the mouse to aim,
and hold left mouse to shoot.

You can download and use the source code to make your own game,
free and commercial.  Just don't  re-upload the demo as is. 
Learn from it, build on it, and make your own unique game.
There is more info in the readme file in the source code.

For more information about Tabageos and to get the latest releases visit www.tabageos.com
